entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7. POP 60%
